Try these commands via the Firebug console:

TB.inspect("_root.main"); // inspect movieclip _level0.main
TB.inspect("_root.main._width"); // element width: 380
TB.set("_root.main.head._x", 20); // set new position
TB.set("_root.main.infoText.text", "New message"); // change text
TB.cd("_root.main.head"); // set new context
TB.inspect("_y"); // y position of current content
TB.cd(".."); // select parent movieclip
